title: cursor too small at 2560x1440???
body: so I just got a new laptop and its at 2560x1440 resolution. that is also the recommended resolution when i play league. the only thing is that my cursor in league is SUPER small and its really hard to play that way. any ideas on how to fix this?

replies.body:
Your resolution is higher than currently supported for League (1920x1080).  You're going to run into some visual issues especially on 4K.  Your best bet would be to reduce your resolution in-game and native.  Otherwise you may want to swap to another screen.  If needed, a config reset can default your resolution:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.
